required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

brief_summary.textblock: Following product approval, confirmation of appropriate VF episode detection after MRI exposure of the ProMRI ICD/CRT-D systems and to evaluate left ventricular pacing threshold changes post-MRI.

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of ICD/CRT-D subjects with a â‰¥ 5 second delay in post-MRI VF detection.
primary_outcome.description: Primary objectives will be analyzed once 25 subjects implanted with the ProMRI ICD system have been identified with a documented true VF episode post-MRI.

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of LV pacing leads with a LV pacing threshold increase > 1V between pre-MRI and one-month post-MRI.

secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of subjects with appropriate restoration of tachycardia detection and ICD therapy post-MRI.
Proportion of subjects who experience left ventricular sensing amplitude attenuation >50% between pre-MRI and 30 days post-MRI.

study_pop.textblock: ProMRI ICD/CRT-D system enabled with BIOTRONIK Home Monitoring.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- ProMRI ICD/CRT-D system enabled with BIOTRONIK Home Monitoring.
Exclusion Criteria:
